meta.name: description
meta.content: Our infectious disease experts have answered common questions about the virus, including advice about how to protect yourself, what to do if you're asked to self quarantine and a list of reliable information sources.
COVID-19 community information | Nebraska Medicine Omaha, NE

Our infectious disease experts have answered common questions about the virus, including advice about how to protect yourself, what to do if you're asked to self quarantine and a list of reliable information sources.

link.title: COVID-19 community information | Nebraska Medicine Omaha, NE

div.p: View COVID-19 information | Read our visitor policy

meta.content: Nebraska Medicine and the University of Nebraska Medical Center have led the world in treatment, training and quarantine methods for highly infectious diseases since caring for patients during the 2014 Ebola outbreak.
meta.p: Nebraska Medicine and the University of Nebraska Medical Center have led the world in treatment, training and quarantine methods for highly infectious diseases since caring for patients during the 2014 Ebola outbreak.

p.strong: Call 911 if this is a medical emergency.

p.a: I have a cough, fever or shortness of breath
I do not have symptoms, but need to quarantine

meta.p: To make room for COVID-19 patients, we're delaying elective procedures, cancelling events and adjusting policies. View a list of our closings and cancellations.

Below, our infectious disease experts have answered common questions about the virus, including advice about how to protect yourself, what to do if you're asked to self-quarantine and a list of reliable information sources.
meta.div: View a map of COVID-19 cases in Nebraska.
meta.p: What coronavirus (COVID-19) is, where the virus comes from and why it's potentially dangerous.
How the virus spreads, including the risk of contracting it by touching packages from overseas or living with pets.
Our infectious diseases experts outline how immunocompromised patients can protect themselves, and answer common questions.
How to protect yourself and your family, how health systems are preparing and resources for making travel decisions.
Details about who should be screened for COVID-19, and how the screening works.
A list of symptoms, information about who's considered high risk and treatment recommendations.
What to do if you've been told to self-quarantine, how to care for someone who's self quarantined and what to do if you live with someone who's been told to self-quarantine.
A comprehensive list of high quality apps, websites and tip sheets to help you manage any stress or anxiety caused by COVID-19.
Links to credible and reliable information sources, including the CDC, WHO and NETEC.

h3.a: Information for University of Nebraska students, residents, faculty and staff

meta.p: Instructions for students, residents, faculty and staff who have recently traveled, or who may have been exposed to COVID-19.
Information about those who were treated at the National Quarantine Unit and the Nebraska Biocontainment Unit for COVID-19.

li.a: Info for students, faculty and staff
Bellevue Medical Center directions and parking
Nebraska Medical Center directions and parking
Lauritzen Outpatient Center directions and parking
Oakview Health Center directions and parking
Village Pointe Health Center directions and parking
Power of Attorney and Advanced Directives
What to bring and wear to surgery
Types of support staff and what they do
Nominate a nurse for the Daisy Award
Visitor guidelines: Who can visit and when
Insurance plans and networks accepted by Nebraska Medicine
Before treatment: Estimates, registration and verifying insurance
After treatment: Receiving and paying your bill
Set up a living will or power of attorney
Stroke, brain aneurysm and AVM support groups
Support groups for children grieving a death
Support groups for parents who have lost a child
The Centering Corporation Grief Resource Center
Meet our Child and Family Development team

img.alt: Featured in U.S. News Best Hospitals of 2019-2020

div.p: Your browser needs to have JavaScript enabled to use this feature.

div.data-bind: css: { show: true }, component: { name: 'tiles', params: { instanceId: '7f2be970-3362-4d36-87da-6719998676e7' } }

section.aria-label: Explore Our Patient and Provider Stories

div.p: Learn more about Nebraska Medicine, our patients and our services. Select a topic from the menu below to get started.

select.title: Select Topic
select.data-bind: options: treatments, optionsText: 'name', optionsCaption: 'Select Topic', value: selectedTreatment, selectpicker

select.title: Select Type of Content
select.data-bind: options: categories, optionsText: 'name', optionsCaption: 'Select Type of Content', value: selectedCategory, selectpicker

button.data-bind: css: { open: displayFilters(), closed: !displayFilters() }, click: toggleFilters, text: displayFilters() ? 'close filter' : 'open filter'

div.h2: Explore our patient and provider stories

article.data-bind: css: getClasses(), style: { backgroundImage: image() ? 'url(' + image() + ')' : 'none'}
css: getClasses(), style: { backgroundImage: image() ? 'url(' + image() + ')' : 'none'}
css: getClasses(), style: { backgroundImage: image() ? 'url(' + image() + ')' : 'none'}
css: getClasses(), style: { backgroundImage: image() ? 'url(' + image() + ')' : 'none'}
css: getClasses(), style: { backgroundImage: thumbnail() ? 'url(' + thumbnail() + ')' : 'none'}
